title: Elden Ring — 25 Tricks and Hidden Mechanics

media:group.media:title: Elden Ring — 25 Tricks and Hidden Mechanics
media:group.media:description:
Here's a quick Elden Ring guide showing off a bunch of easy to miss/hidden tricks and mechanics.
twitter: https://twitter.com/IronPineapple_
twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iron_pineapple

huge thanks to Max58 for the art in the thumbnail: https://twitter.com/Max58Art
